title: Nice early baseball player postcards for sale
author: balltrash

posts.post_title: Nice early baseball player postcards for sale
posts.post_content:
1907 Dietsche Germany Schaefer - No creases or wrinkles, some light/mild wear, most notable is a small upper surface chip to lower edge - $50
1907 Grignon Jimmy Sheckard - Postally cancelled, some scattered wear including creases to upper right corner, there is a gouge/flattened indentation on top edge - $175
1907-09 Novelty Cutlery Art Devlin - Clean overall with some light corner wear. No creases/wrinkles - $250
1914 Sporting News Roger Bresnahan - Mild wear including some light creases/wrinkles (I would tend to call these more wrinkles than creases) - $325

I will pay for shipping and items will be well packaged and sent with signature required. Payment accepted through Paypal F/F.

PM or email more info or purchase/make an offer.

Thank you!
